001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Dates;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.ChangeTimeDateResponse;
011
012import java.time.Instant;
013
014/**
015 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.ChangeTimeDateResponse}, opCode -42, size 4
016 *
017 * <br>
018 *
019 * 
020 * <table border='1'>
021 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
022 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-42</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
023 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>4</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.ChangeTimeDateResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * </table>
029 */
030@MessageProps(
031    opCode=-42,
032    size=4,
033    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
034    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
035    signed=true,
036    response=ChangeTimeDateResponse.class
037)
038public class ChangeTimeDateRequest extends Message {
039
040    private long tandemEpochTime;
041    private Instant instant;
042
043    public ChangeTimeDateRequest() {
044        this.cargo = EMPTY;
045    }
046
047    public ChangeTimeDateRequest(long tandemEpochTime) {
048        this.cargo = buildCargo(tandemEpochTime);
049        parse(cargo);
050    }
051
052    public ChangeTimeDateRequest(Instant timestamp) {
053        this(Dates.fromInstantToJan12008EpochSeconds(timestamp));
054    }
055
056    public ChangeTimeDateRequest(byte[] raw) {
057        parse(raw);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * <table border="1">
062     * <caption>Parsed fields for ChangeTimeDateRequest:</caption>
063     * <tr><td><code>tandemEpochTime</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
064     * <tr><td><code>instant</code></td><td><code>getInstant()</code></td></tr>
065     * </table>
066     */
067    public void parse(byte[] raw) { 
068        raw = this.removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
069        Preconditions.checkArgument(raw.length == props().size());
070        this.cargo = raw;
071        this.tandemEpochTime = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0);
072        this.instant = getInstant();
073        
074    }
075
076
077    /**
078     * <table border="1">
079     * <caption>Byte layout for ChangeTimeDateRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
080     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
081     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint32(tandemEpochTime) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
082     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint32(tandemEpochTime) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
083     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(tandemEpochTime) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
084     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(tandemEpochTime) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
085     * </table>
086     */
087    public static byte[] buildCargo(long tandemEpochTime) {
088        return Bytes.combine(
089                Bytes.toUint32(tandemEpochTime)
090        );
091    }
092
093
094    public long getTandemEpochTime() {
095        return tandemEpochTime;
096    }
097
098
099    public Instant getInstant() {
100        return Dates.fromJan12008EpochSecondsToDate(tandemEpochTime);
101    }
102
103}
